Title: Equips all ambulances and emergency ambulance service vehicles with stop-arms
Summary: Equips all ambulances and emergency ambulance service vehicles with stop-arms; provides rules and regulations shall be promulgated to provide for such equipment.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to equipping all ambulances and emergency ambulance service vehicles with stop-arms
